items.sentence: I can\'t live on three hundred dollars a month.
I don\'t eat at the school cafeteria every day.
You have to be here at 2:30 tomorrow afternoon.
Tom often writes about his friends in his blog.
Tom only makes about half as much as Mary does.
Tom opened his eyes and looked around the room.
Are you sure that you don\'t know what this is?
Tom is probably not as busy as you think he is.
Tom is probably not as rich as you think he is.
I was the one who taught Tom to sing like that.
